title: bebel gilberto's latest
content:
Looking for the typeface used in the advertising for Bebel Gilberto’s iTunes exclusive live session. It’s maddeningly similar to Avant Garde and Ronda, but they aren’t it. Any ideas?

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [example.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195241/http:/typophile.com/files/example_0.png) | 258 KB |

 [‹ tso typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195241/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42307 "Go to previous forum topic") [What is this type face? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195241/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42298 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dcubed20

comments.content:
it’s close, but I don’t think it’s Chalet, unless of course some of the letters have been adjusted, like the ’e’ & the ’t’ for example.

JH
